More details about what this external tool is doing to the resource tree would 
be interesting. Of course a reproduceable test case would be even better.

It's the SCM tool, basically I was doing a check out operation, which replaces 
the file with a writable copy of it with a few header comments modifed in the 
file.
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 43386 ***
